article.title: Gervais Assigned to Army Maneuver Support Center of Excellence

tags.tag: U.S. Army Maneuver Support Center of Excellence

article.text: Brig. Gen. Maria R. Gervais, USA, has been assigned as commandant, U.S. Army Chemical, Biological, Radiological and Nuclear School, U.S. Army Maneuver Support Center of Excellence, Fort Leonard Wood, Missouri.
